all case have a remarkably poor prognosis , with a mean survival of 9.6 +/- 6.6 month .
for the 7 aml case that be uniformly treat accord to the amlcg86/92 protocol , disease-free and overall survival be significantly bad than for the overall study group ( p = .03 and p = .01 , respectively ) .
we conclude that the t(10;11)(p13;q14) indicate calm and mll rearrangement in morphologically distinct subset of acute leukemia and may be associate with a poor prognosis .
direct demonstration of nfatp dephosphorylation and nuclear localization in activate ht-2 cell use a specific nfatp polyclonal antibody .
nuclear factor of activate t cell ( nfat ) regulate transcription of a number of cytokine gene , and nfat dna binding activity be stimulate follow t cell activation .
several line of evidence have suggest that nfat be a substrate for calcineurin , a serine/threonine phosphatase .
use a polyclonal antibody to murine nfatp , western blot analysis of various mouse tissue demonstrate that the 110-130-kda nfatp protein be highly express in thymus and spleen .
treatment of immunoprecipitated nfatp from untreated ht-2 cell with calcineurin result in the dephosphorylation of nfatp , demonstrate that nfatp be an in vitro substrate for calcineurin .
nfatp immunoprecipitated from 32p-labeled ht-2 cell migrate a an approximately 120-kda protein that be localized to the cytosol of the cell .
treatment of the cell with ionomycin result in a decrease in the molecular weight of nfatp and a loss of 32p , consistent with nfatp dephosphorylation .
the dephosphorylation of nfatp be accompany by localization of the protein to the nuclear fraction .
both of these event be block by preincubation of the cell with fk506 , a calcineurin inhibitor , consistent with the hypothesis that nfatp be a calcineurin substrate in cell .
expression of erythroid-specific gene in acute megakaryoblastic leukaemia and transient myeloproliferative disorder in down 's syndrome .
acute megakaryoblastic leukaemia ( m7 ) and transient myeloproliferative disorder in down 's syndrome ( tmd ) be characterize by rapid growth of abnormal blast cell which express megakaryocytic marker .
to clarify property of the blast cell in m7 and tmd case , we examine erythroid marker expression in blast from six case with m7 and seven case with tmd in this study .
erythroid-specific mrna encode gamma-globin and erythroid delta-aminolevulinate synthase be find to be express in blast from most of these case , indicate that majority of the blast in m7 and tmd case have erythroid and megakaryocytic phenotype .
we also find that mrna encode gata-1 and gata-2 be express in all these case .
these result suggest that m7 blast and tmd blast correspond to the erythroid/megakaryocytic bipotential progenitor cell .
glucocorticoid receptor in cord blood lymphocyte of healthy neonate and of preterms suffer from respiratory distress syndrome .
we measure the number of glucocorticoid receptor ( gr ) in cord blood lymphocyte and the binding affinity ( kd ) in 15 term and in 20 preterm baby .
thirteen preterms of the latter group receive prenatal steroid treatment .
seven preterms develop neonatal respiratory distress syndrome ( nrds ) .
the number of gr and the kd be similar in the term and preterm ( with and without nrds ) baby .
the maximum (3h)-thymidine incorporation into dna of cord blood lymphocyte from all preterms , with or without nrds be suppress when compare to that from term baby or adult .
this could partly be explain by the antenatal steroid treatment .
sensitivity ( id50 ) of the lymphocyte for the inhibitory effect of dexamethasone be the same in all group .
in this study on the number and function of gr in lymphocyte , we be unable to find a relation between the functionality of the gr and the development of nrds .
genetic characterization of transactivation of the human t-cell leukemia virus type 1 promoter : binding of tax to tax -responsive element 1 be mediate by the cyclic amp-responsive member of the creb/atf family of transcription factor .
to achieve a good understanding of the mechanism of transactivation by tax of human t-cell leukemia virus type 1 tax -responsive element 1 ( tre-1 ) , we develop a genetic approach with saccharomyces cerevisiae .
we construct a yeast reporter strain contain the lacz gene under the control of the cyc1 promoter associate with three copy of tre-1 .
expression of either the cyclic amp response element-binding protein ( creb ) or creb fuse to the gal4 activation domain ( gad ) in this strain do not modify the expression of the reporter gene .
tax alone be also inactive .
however , expression of the reporter gene be induce by coexpression of tax and creb .
this effect be strong with the gad-creb fusion protein .
analysis of different creb mutant with this genetic system indicate that the c-terminal 92 amino acid residue , which include the basic domain and the leucine zipper , be necessary and sufficient to mediate transactivation by tax .
to identify cellular protein bind to tre-1 in a tax -dependent manner , this strain be also use to screen a library of human cdna fuse to gad .
of five positive clone isolate from 0.75 x 10(6) yeast colony , four be member of the creb/activating transcription factor ( atf ) family : creb , two isoforms of the cyclic amp-responsive element modulator ( crem ) , and atf-1 .
interestingly , these three protein can be phosphorylated by protein kinase a and thus form a particular subgroup within the creb/atf family .
expression of atf-2 in s. cerevisiae do not activate tre-1 in the presence of tax .
this show that in a eukaryotic nucleus , tax specifically interact with the basic domain -leucine zipper region of atf-1 , creb , and crem .
the fifth clone identify in this screening correspond to the ku autoantigen p70 subunit .
when fuse to gad , the c-terminal region of ku be able to activate transcription via tre-1 but this activation be not dependent on tax .
cyclosporin a inhibit monocyte tissue factor activation in cardiac transplant recipient .
background : fibrin deposition and thrombosis have be implicate in both allograft rejection and vasculopathy after cardiac transplantation .
because monocyte play a pivotal role in the pathophysiology of intravascular coagulation activation through their ability to synthesize tissue factor ( tf ) , we ask ( 1 ) whether monocyte tf activation occur in cardiac transplant recipient and ( 2 ) whether monocyte tf expression be affect by treatment with cyclosporin a ( csa ) .
method and result : we measure level of tf activity in peripheral blood mononuclear cell and highly purify monocyte /macrophages from 10 consecutive cardiac transplant recipient and 10 healthy control subject .
tf activity generate by both unstimulated and endotoxin-stimulated cell be significantly high in transplant recipient than in control subject ( p < .05 ) .
increase monocyte tf expression in transplant recipient be show to be adversely affect by treatment with csa : tf induction be markedly reduce by csa serum concentration reach peak csa drug level .
inhibition of tf induction in the presence of high csa blood concentration be also observe when stimulation of cell be perform with interferon-gamma or interleukin-1beta .
a show by reverse transcription-polymerase chain reaction and electrophoretic mobility shift assay , respectively , treatment with csa lead to decrease tf mrna expression and reduce activation of the nf-kappab transcription factor , which be know to contribute to the induction of the tf promotor in human monocyte .
conclusion : this study demonstrate that tf activation , occur in mononuclear cell of cardiac transplant recipient , be inhibit by treatment with csa .
inhibition of monocyte tf induction by csa may contribute to it successful use in cardiac transplant medicine and might be useful in manage further setting of vascular pathology also know to involve tf expression and nf-kappab activation .
interleukin 10 induced c-fos expression in human b cell by activation of divergent protein kinase .
il-10 be a potent mediator of human b cell growth and plasma cell formation .
however , signal transduction of il-10 in b cell be poorly understand .
in this study the effect of il-10 on the expression of the protooncogene c-fos be investigate , because fo play a potential role in the regulation of b cell proliferation and differentiation .
b cell be purify from buffy coat preparation of healthy blood donor by positive selection use an anti cd20 monoclonal antibody and a minimacs separation unit .
b cell be prestimulated with sac for 48 hr .
then , cell be incubate with medium or il-10 ( 100 ng/ml ) for 10 to 120 min .
rna be extract by phenol/chloroform and c-fos expression be analyze by pcr assisted mrna assay .
a significant 2-4 fold increase of c-fos expression be observe within 30 min of stimulation with il-10 ( p < 0.01 ) .
after 2 hr c-fos expression decline to basal level .
the effect of il-10 be dose-dependent with a maximum stimulation use 100 ng/ml of il-10 .
the il-10 effect on c-fos expression be not block by polymyxin b .
use the tyrosine kinase inhibitor genistein ( 10 microm ) a complete inhibition of il-10 induced c-fos expression be observe .
in addition , h-7 ( 10 microm ) , a specific inhibitor of serine /threonine kinase , significantly block il-10 mediated c-fos expression ( p < 0.05 ) .
in conclusion , these data show that il-10 induce c-fos expression in human b-cells by activation of tyrosine and serine /threonine kinase .
since this be the first report on il-10 induced signal transduction , these data may help to identify the intracellular mechanism by which il-10 stimulate human b-cells .
involvement of phosphatidylinositol 3-kinase in nfat activation in t cell .
phosphatidylinositol 3-kinase ( pi3-k ) have be implicate in the regulation of cell proliferation in many cell type .
we have previously show that in t cell the pi3-k inhibitor , wortmannin , interfere with activation of the mitogen-activated kinase , erk2 , after t cell receptor ( tcr ) stimulation .
to far explore the involvement of pi3-k in t cell activation , we create a set of potentially dominant negative pi3-k construct comprise individual or tandem domain of the regulatory p85 subunit and test their effect on downstream signaling event like erk2 activation and transcription from an nfat ( nuclear factor of activate t cell ) element take from the interleukin-2 promoter .
follow tcr stimulation , activation of erk2 be only inhibit by a previously describe truncated form of p85 that can not bind the catalytic subunit , but not by other construct of p85 .
in contrast , several mutant p85 allele have dramatic effect on nfat activation .
most interestingly , the n-terminal sh2 domain have an inhibitory effect , whereas a mutant p85 contain only the two sh2 domain enhance basal nfat activity in a ra -dependent manner .
ionomycin induce synergistic activation of nfat in cell express p85 mutant that contain the c-terminal sh2 domain .
analysis of phosphotyrosine -containing protein bind to truncate p85 construct reveal cooperative binding of the two sh2 domain but no apparent difference between the n- and c- terminal sh2 domain .
wortmannin do not interfere with nfat activation , although it inhibit pi3-k and erk2 activation in the same experiment .
these result suggest that pi3-k be involve in nfat activation through a complex adaptor function of it regulatory subunit and that it lipid kinase activity be dispensable for this effect .
activation of e2f -mediated transcription by human t-cell leukemia virus type i tax protein in a p16 ( ink4a ) -negative t-cell line .
the human t-cell leukemia virus type i ( htlv-i ) be a causative agent of adult t-cell leukemia .
although the exact mechanism by which htlv-i contribute to leukemogenesis be still unclear , the tax protein be think to play a major role in this process .
this 40-kda polypeptide be able to interact with the tumor suppressor p16 ( ink4a ) .
consequently , tax can activate the signaling pathway that lead to the release of e2f that in turn induce expression of factor require for cell cycle progression .
in this paper , we demonstrate that tax can also activate e2f -mediated transcription independently of p16 ( ink4a ) .
indeed , when tax be coexpressed with the e2f-1 transcription factor in cem t-cells , which lack expression of p16 ( ink4a ) , it strongly potentiate the e2f -dependent activation of a reporter construct drive by a promoter contain e2f binding site .
this stimulation be abrogate by mutation affect the e2f -binding site .
in addition , tax also stimulate the transcription of the e2f-1 gene itself .
use tax mutant that fail to activate either atf - or nf-kappab-dependent promoter and different 5' truncation mutant of the e2f-1 promoter , we show that the tax -dependent transcriptional control of the e2f1 gene involve , at least in part , the atf binding site located in the e2f-1 promoter .
differentiation-associated expression of the epstein-barr virus bzlf1 transactivator protein in oral hairy leukoplakia .
the bzlf1 protein of epstein-barr virus ( ebv ) be a key immediate-early protein which have be show to disrupt virus latency in ebv -infected b cell .
we have generate a monoclonal antibody , bz1 , to bzlf1 which react in immunohistology , immunoblotting , and immunoprecipitation and which recognize both the active , dimeric form and the inactive , monomeric form of the protein .
biopsy of oral hairy leukoplakia , an aids-associated lesion characterize by high-level ebv replication , be examine by immunohistochemistry use the bz1 monoclonal antibody .
a differentiation-associated pattern of bzlf1 expression be observe , bz1 react with nucleus of the upper spinous layer of the lesion .
this finding suggest that the bzlf1 promoter may be regulate by the degree of squamous differentiation .
a comparison of in situ hybridization to ebv dna and viral capsid antigen stain with bz1 reactivity suggest that bzlf1 expression precede rampant virus replication .
the inability to detect ebv in the lower epithelial layer of oral hairy leukoplakia raise question concern the nature of ebv latency and persistence in stratified squamous epithelium .
am580 , a stable benzoic derivative of retinoic acid , have powerful and selective cyto-differentiating effect on acute promyelocytic leukemia cell .
all-trans retinoic acid ( atra ) be successfully use in the cyto-differentiating treatment of acute promyelocytic leukemia ( apl ) .
paradoxically , apl cell express pml-rar , an aberrant form of the retinoic acid receptor type alpha ( rar alpha ) derive from the leukemia-specific t(15;17) chromosomal translocation .
we show here that am580 , a stable retinobenzoic derivative originally synthesize a a rar alpha agonist , be a powerful inducer of granulocytic maturation in nb4 , an apl -derived cell line , and in freshly isolate apl blast .
after treatment of apl cell with am580 either alone or in combination with granulocyte colony-stimulating factor ( g-csf ) , the compound induce granulocytic maturation , a assess by determination of the level of leukocyte alkaline phosphatase , cd11b , cd33 , and g-csf receptor mrna , at concentration that be 10- to 100-fold low than those of atra necessary to produce similar effect .
by contrast , am580 be not effective a atra in modulate the expression of these differentiation marker in the hl-60 cell line and in freshly isolate granulocyte obtain from the peripheral blood of chronic myelogenous leukemia patient during the stable phase of the disease .
in nb4 cell , two other synthetic nonselective rar ligand be capable of induce lap as much a am580 , whereas rar beta- or rar gamma-specific ligand be totally ineffective .
these result show that am580 be more powerful than atra in modulate the expression of differentiation antigen only in cell in which pml-rar be present .
binding experiment , use cos-7 cell transiently transfected with pml-rar and the normal rar alpha , show that am580 have a low affinity than atra for both receptor .
however , in the presence of pml-rar , the synthetic retinoid be a much good transactivator of retinoic acid -responsive element-containing promoter than the natural retinoid , whereas , in the presence of rar alpha , am580 and atra have similar activity .
this may explain the strong cyto-differentiating potential of am580 in pml-rar -containing leukemic cell .
hypoxia enhance induction of endothelial icam-1 : role for metabolic acidosis and proteasomes .
intercellular adhesion molecule 1 ( icam-1 ) be an important molecule in promotion of polymorphonuclear neutrophil transendothelial migration during inflammation .
coincident with many inflammatory disease be tissue hypoxia .
thus we hypothesize that combination of hypoxia and inflammatory stimulus may differentially regulate expression of endothelial icam-1 .
human endothelial cell be expose to hypoxia in the presence or absence of add lipopolysaccharide ( lp ) and examine for expression of functional icam-1 .
although hypoxia alone do not induce icam-1 , the combination of lp and hypoxia enhance ( 3 +/- 0.4-fold over normoxia ) icam-1 expression .
combination of hypoxia and lp significantly increase lymphocyte binding , and such increase be inhibit by addition of anti- icam-1 antibody or antisense oligonucleotides .
hypoxic endothelium show a > 10-fold increase in sensitivity to inhibitor of proteasome activation , and combination of hypoxia and lp enhance proteasome -dependent cytoplasmic-to-nuclear localization of the nuclear transcription factor-kappa b p65 ( rel a ) subunit .
such proteasome activation correlate with hypoxia -evoked decrease in both extracellular and intracellular ph .
we conclude from these study that endothelial hypoxia provide a novel , proteasome -dependent stimulus for icam-1 induction .
construction and biological characterization of an interleukin-12 fusion protein ( flexi-12 ) : delivery to acute myeloid leukemic blast use adeno-associated virus .
interleukin-12 ( il-12 ) be a cytokine that exhibit pleiotropic effect on lymphocyte and natural killer cell and have be show to have promise for the immunotherapy of cancer .
the combination of the immune costimulatory molecule b7.1 and il-12 have be show to be synergistic for t cell activation .
by transfecting tumor cell with both il-12 and b7.1 cdna , it may be possible to use these modify target a vaccine .
a major obstacle in design a vector to deliver these gene result from the structure of il-12 .
functional il-12 be a heterodimer compose of two distinct subunit that be encode by separate gene on different chromosome .
production of functional il-12 require the coordinate expression of both gene .
this present several problem in vector , particularly those in which additional gene , either a co-stimulatory gene or a selectable marker , be insert .
therefore , we have construct a single cdna that encode a single-chain protein , call flexi-12 , which retain all of the biological characteristic of recombinant il-12 ( ril-12 ) .
the monomeric polypeptide flexi-12 be able to induce the proliferation of phytohemagglutinin ( pha ) blast , induce pha blast to secrete interferon-gamma ( ifn-gamma ) and additionally , by preincubation , enhance the killing of k562 target by pbls .
these phenomenon be in a dose-dependent manner comparable to that see with ril-12 .
we have also show that tyrosine phosphorylation of the stat 4 transcription factor , which have be show to be unique to the il-12 signaling pathway , occur with flexi-12 at level similar to those see with ril-12 .
we have package flexi-12 into a recombinant adeno-associated virus ( aav ) and use this vector to infect acute myeloid leukemic ( aml ) blast .
infected aml blast produce between 2 and 6 ng of il-12/10 ( 6 ) cell per ml per 48 hr .
these study also confirm that aav be an efficient delivery vehicle for cytokine to leukemic cell .
direct analysis of these modify cell act a tumor vaccine be underway .
the cellular oncogene c-myb can interact synergistically with the epstein-barr virus bzlf1 transactivator in lymphoid cell .
regulation of replicative function in the epstein-barr virus ( ebv ) genome be mediate through activation of a virally encode transcription factor , z ( bzlf1 ) .
we have show that the z gene product , which bind to ap-1 site a a homodimer and have sequence similarity to c-fos , can efficiently activate the ebv early promoter , bmrf1 , in certain cell type ( i.e. , hela cell ) but not others ( i.e. , jurkat cell ) .
here we demonstrate that the c-myb proto-oncogene product , which be itself a dna-binding protein and transcriptional transactivator , can interact synergistically with z in activate the bmrf1 promoter in jurkat cell ( a t-cell line ) or raji cell ( an ebv -positive b-cell ) , whereas the c-myb gene product by itself have little effect .
the simian virus 40 early promoter be also synergistically activate by the z/c-myb combination .
synergistic transactivation of the bmrf1 promoter by the z/c-myb combination appear to involve direct binding by the z protein but not the c-myb protein .
a 30-bp sequence in the bmrf1 promoter which contain a z binding site ( a consensus ap-1 site ) be sufficient to transfer high-level lymphoid-specific responsiveness to the z/c-myb combination to a heterologous promoter .
that the c-myb oncogene product can interact synergistically with an ebv -encoded member of the leucine zipper protein family suggest c-myb be likely to engage in similar interaction with cellularly encode transcription factor .
glucocorticoid receptor in systemic lupus erythematosus .
glucocorticosteroids remain the major treatment modality for systemic lupus erythematosus ( sle ) , but their mechanism of action be unclear .
over the past decade it have become clear that glucocorticosteroid receptor play a significant role in the mechanism of glucocorticosteroid action .
we study glucocorticosteroid receptor density and affinity on peripheral blood mononuclear cell by the glucocorticosteroid binding assay in 33 patient with sle who have take no glucocorticosteroid for the previous 6 month and in 32 healthy control .
patient ' disease activity be measure by the sle disease activity index ( sledai ) .
glucocorticosteroid receptor on leukocyte of patient with sle be significantly high than in healthy control ( 4419 +/- 306 v 3369 +/- 196 , p less than 0.005 ) .
the binding affinity be not different between patient and control .
there be no correlation between glucocorticosteroid receptor number and sle disease activity .

acute promyelocytic leukemia ( apl ) be a specific type of acute myeloid leukemia characterize by the morphology of the blast cell , a specific t(15;17) translocation , and risk of definite coagulopathy .
recently this leukemia be far characterize by an exquisite sensitivity to all-trans retinoic acid 's differentiation effect and the production of a fusion gene alter the gene of raralpha and a novel gene pml .

cupric ion block nf kappa b activation through inhibit the signal-induced phosphorylation of i kappa b alpha .
a transcription factor nf kappa b , which regulate expression of various cellular gene involve in immune response and viral gene include hiv , be sequester in the cytoplasm a a complex with an inhibitory protein i kappa b .
various extracellular signal induce phosphorylation and rapid degradation of i kappa b alpha to release nf kappa b .
cu2+ be find to inhibit the activation of nf kappa b induce by tnf-alpha , tpa , or h2o2 .

neither phosphorylation nor degradation of i kappa b alpha be observe upon tnf-alpha stimulation in the presence of cu2+ .
these result indicate that cu2+ inhibit the release of nf kappa b by blockade of a signal lead to the phosphorylation of i kappa b alpha .
nf-kappa b -independent suppression of hiv expression by ascorbic acid .
ascorbic acid ( ascorbate or vitamin c ) have be show to suppress the induction of hiv in latently infected t lymphocytic cell follow stimulation with a tumor promoter ( pma ) and inflammatory cytokine ( tnf-alpha ) .
to assess whether this inhibition be mediate via modulation of the cellular transcription factor , nf-kappa b , we carry out gel shift analysis on nuclear extract prepare under different condition of cell stimulation in the presence or absence of ascorbate , n-acetylcysteine ( nac ) , or zidovudine ( azt ) .
pretreatment of ach-2 t cell by nac follow by stimulation with pma , tnf-alpha , or hydrogen peroxide ( h2o2 ) result in strong suppression of nf-kappa b activation .
in contrast , neither ascorbate nor azt affect nf-kappa b activity under all three induction condition in the ach-2 cell line .
ascorbate and azt also have no effect on nf-kappa b activation follow tnf-alpha- or pma- induced stimulation of u1 promonocytic cell .
these result suggest that the molecular mechanism of hiv inhibition by ascorbate be not mediate via nf-kappa b inhibition , unlike that see with other antioxidant .
thrombopoietin and it receptor .
thrombopoietin ( tpo ) , the primary physiological regulator of platelet production , be initially think to be a lineage-specific factor act predominantly on megakaryocytopoiesis .
detailed study establish that this cytokine mediate biological effect on a broad spectrum of hematopoietic progenitor cell , include stem cell .
tpo be a hormone constitutively produce mainly by the liver and kidney .
plasma tpo level be regulate by the platelet and megakaryocyte mass through mpl receptor binding , internalization and degradation .
the mpl receptor be a member of the hematopoietin receptor superfamily lack intrinsic kinase activity .
upon ligand-induced mpl homodimerization , the major signaling event for proliferation be mediate through the jak2 /stat5 pathway , while differentiation might occur through a prolonged activation of the mapk pathway .
preclinical and clinical study demonstrate the potential use of tpo in a variety of context , but it be too early to evaluate it benefit in reduce platelet transfusion .
granulocyte colony-stimulating factor activate a 72-kda isoform of stat3 in human neutrophil .

statg in normal immature human myeloid cell , i.e. adult cd34+ bone marrow cell , be compose of stat3beta .
